verbs.description: The National Football League [V: is] now plunged into politics as players throughout the sport kneel for the national anthem and President Donald Trump continues to rebuke them publicly .

[ARG1: The National Football League] is [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: plunged] [ARG2: into politics] [ARGM-TMP: as players throughout the sport kneel for the national anthem and President Donald Trump continues to rebuke them publicly] .

The National Football League is now plunged into politics as players throughout the sport kneel for the national anthem and [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: continues] [ARG1: to rebuke them publicly] .

The National Football League is now plunged into politics as players throughout the sport kneel for the national anthem and [ARG0: President Donald Trump] continues to [V: rebuke] [ARG1: them] [ARGM-MNR: publicly] .
